column2: an A.M. Eatery////When we went back for a friend's birthday
column4: this is something I have to order again." I actually had a piece of a friend's pancake the second time around
column5: and I thought it was pretty good. Light and fluffy
column6: as all pancakes should be. However
column7: with my sweet potato hash. the eggs were slightly cold
column8: but well-seasoned. Cheese on sweet potatoes is an innovation that you would never have previously imagined; it was... interesting. Atmosphere was vibrant and buzzing. The wait is horrendous; the parking is atrocious. I suggest you get there early
column9: or have a sacrificial friend wait ahead of time there. We had time to head to the Walgreens across the street to purchase snacks while waiting.
